testCases.explanation: Delete from left: remove 1,3,5 → [2,4]. Delete from right: remove 4 → [2]. Last remaining is 2.
Delete from left: remove 1,3 → [2]. Last remaining is 2.
Delete from left: remove 1 → [2]. Last remaining is 2.
Delete from left: remove 1,3,5 → [2,4,6]. Delete from right: remove 6,2 → [4]. Last remaining is 4.

description: Given an array `nums`, alternately delete elements from the left and right ends (first pass deletes every other element from the left, second pass from the right, etc.) until one element remains. Return that element.

examples.explanation: Left pass removes 1,3,5 → [2,4]. Right pass removes 4 → [2].
Left pass removes 1,3,5 → [2,4,6]. Right pass removes 6,2 → [4].
